entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023
